resources.string: VoicedResistor
Settings
Three bands
Four bands
Five bands
Tap to Search
Information

Welcome to VoicedResistor, allowing you to search for resistor color codes with voice recognition.

When searching by resistor color code, start with the first significant figure and end with the multiplier or tolerance band. 

When searching for a color code from the resistor value, give the value with the tolerance, if available, and without abbreviations. When searching values lower than 10Î©, omit the units for more accurate detection.
OK
\u2717 Not a standard value
\u2713 Standard value
Audio error\nError recording audio. Please check microphone settings and try again.
Network error\nError accessing the Internet. Please check Internet connection and try again.
Network timeout\nNetwork operation timed out. Please check Internet connection and try again.
Insufficient permissions error\nNo permission to record audio. Please enable permission to continue.
No match found\nService provided no match. Please try again, and speak clearly and naturally.
Speech recogniser busy\nService is busy at the moment. Please try again.
Server error\nServer error code received. Please try again.
Speech timeout error\nNo speech input found. Please try again, and speak clearly and naturally.
Invalid input\nInput was not a valid color or value. Please give all the color bands or the correct value.
Invalid tolerance band\nRecognised tolerance band color is invalid.
Unknown error\nYou\'re guess is as good as mine. Please try again.
Google Voice Search not installed\nPlease install Google Voice Search from the Play Store.
